root.name: add_library

example.code:
add_library('pdf')
size(displayWidth, displayHeight, PDF, "i_am_a_pdf.pdf")
line(0, 0, width, height) line(0, height, width, 0)

root.description: The keyword add_library is used to load a library into a Processing sketch. A library is one or more classes that are grouped together to extend the capabilities of Processing.

parameter.label: libraryName
parameter.description: string: the name of the library to load (e.g. "pdf")
